item.description:
Our next afternoon meet up will be at Borders Books from 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm. Food and drinks available here.

Informal chat and study night, Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

I wont be there if nobody RSVP yes.

I will only wait 15 mins past the hour if some one RSVP yes, but not show up. ( sorry, consider some people RSVP yes, and never show up)

Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the cafe, I will have sign up!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday evening chinese& english language exchange group
